description: React component for a demo Twilio SMS card that allows sending SMS messages directly from the browser, with security warnings and configuration handling.

methods.name: getTwilioConfig
methods.description: Retrieves Twilio configuration from environment variables.

methods.name: isLikelyE164
methods.description: Validates if a phone number is in E.164 format.

methods.name: parseTwilioError
methods.description: Parses error responses from Twilio API.
